input_args.passage: 'Anthony Doerr | Anthony Doerr (born October 27, 1973) is an American author of novels and short stories. He gained widespread recognition for his 2014 novel All the Light ...'
input_args.claim: 'He has written both novels and short stories, and his work includes the story collections The Shell Collector and Memory Wall, a memoir called Four Seasons, and the 2014 novel All the Light.'
